How do I list all available currencies using the `verus` command-line tool without specifying any arguments?

You can't list all available currencies without specifying any arguments. To list all available currencies, you need to use the `listcurrencies` command with the `true` argument, like this: `verus listcurrencies true`.

Examples:
> verus listcurrencies true
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listcurrencies", "params": [true] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
